bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum low center of gravity SX Trail FSR frame, ORE TT/DT, forged HT, pierced seat tube, full cartridge bearing, ISCG mount, 6.6" travel, replaceable derailleur hanger with rear derailleur guard

components.description: 06 Fox DHX 4.0 Coil 9.0x2.75", rebound adjust, ProPedal adjust
Marzocchi 66F single clamp, 170mm travel, internal rebound adjust, alloy ST
1 1/8" alloy upper with OS bearing 7050 cup lower w/13mm insertion
Specialized OS Freeride, 31.8mm DH bar clamp, 660mm wide, 6x9 degree
Truvativ Holzfeller w/BlackSpire DS-1 Lexan Guide
Specialized Disc, 36h, high/low flange, 20mm thru axle
Specialized Chunder 26x2.3" 60 TPI, Aramid bead, 2 ply, Butyl insert, soft compound
Specialized Chunder 26x2.3" 60 TPI, Aramid bead, 2 ply, Butyl insert, soft compound
7050 hard annodized alloy collar with QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
